actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The feral hunter makes two Hunting Knife or Longbow attacks.

actions.name: Hunting Knife
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 10 (2d6+3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 12 (2d8+3) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Fey Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The feral hunter is resistant to the charmed and unconscious conditions.

special_abilities.name: Heightened Senses
special_abilities.desc: The feral hunter's Perception is 19 when perceiving by sight, hearing, or smell.

special_abilities.name: Precise
special_abilities.desc: A weapon that deals piercing damage deals one extra die of its damage when the feral hunter hits with it (included in the attack).

special_abilities.name: Woodland Walk
special_abilities.desc: Difficult terrain composed of nonmagical plants doesn't cost the feral hunter extra movement. In addition, the feral hunter can pass through nonmagical plants without being slowed by them and without taking damage from them if they have thorns, spines, or a similar hazard.
